pages.text: As mentioned previously, the Afterlight portal is made from strange obsidian and ignited with the staff of moonlight. First, construct a rectangular frame (similar to a nether portal) made out of the Strange Obsidian, and light it with the staff of moonlight. One lit, the dimension is accessible and ready to be explored.

This tome will attempt to continue to give assistance when needed. See the next few sections of this book for help with surviving the Afterlight Dimension. This information will only be shown after you've entered the Afterlight itself.
